name: HIV
title: HIV
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) disease.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with HIV and acquired immunodeficiency syndrome. This is a grouping of ICD-10-CM, ICD-9-CM and SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
